subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jake Delhomme threw a 4-yard touchdown pass to Keyshawn Johnson for the go-ahead score in the third quarter and Julius Peppers had three sacks and recovered a fumble as the Carolina Panthers defeated the visiting Tampa Bay Buccaneers, 24-10, last night to end a two-game losing streak.
